meanings.english: to manage; to accomplish; to succeed at (incl. to pass an exam)
meanings.chinese: 完成；办到；成功；通过（考试）

examples.german: Schaffst du es, pünktlich zu kommen?
examples.english: Can you manage to come on time?

meanings.english: to create; to bring into existence (strong verb: schuf, geschaffen)

examples.german: Der Künstler hat ein Meisterwerk geschaffen.
examples.chinese: 艺术家创作了一件杰作。

examples.german: Die Reformen haben neue Arbeitsplätze geschaffen.
examples.english: The reforms have created new jobs.
examples.chinese: 改革创造了新的就业岗位。

meanings.chinese: 把某物送到／搬到某处（口语）

examples.german: Kannst du die Kisten in den Keller schaffen?
examples.english: Can you carry the boxes to the basement?
examples.chinese: 你能把箱子搬到地下室吗？

examples.german: Ich schaffe das Paket zur Post.
examples.english: I’ll take the parcel to the post office.

examples.german: Sie schafften das Kind rechtzeitig ins Krankenhaus.
examples.english: They got the child to the hospital in time.
examples.chinese: 他们及时把孩子送到了医院。
我今天工作到晚上六点。

meanings.english: to wear out; to exhaust (etw. schafft jdn.)
meanings.chinese: 使精疲力尽；累垮（某事使某人）

examples.german: Der Stress hat ihn völlig geschafft.
examples.english: The stress has completely exhausted him.

collocations.german: es ins Finale/in die Top 10 schaffen
collocations.english: to make it to the final/top 10

collocations.chinese: 创造工作岗位／信任／秩序

collocations.german: etw. in den Keller/ins Büro schaffen
collocations.english: to take/carry something to the basement/office
collocations.chinese: 把某物搬到地下室／办公室

related_words.english: to cope with; to manage; to overcome
to get something done; to take care of
